name: Call of CthulhuÂ®
description: 1924. Private Investigator Pierce is sent to look into the tragic death of the Hawkins family. Plunge into a world of creeping madness and cosmic horror. Cryptic clues, shadowy figures, and pure terror bar your way as you fight to retain your sanity and solve an otherworldly mystery.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i5-3450 (3.1 GHz)/AMD FX-6300 (3.5 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 2 GB, GeForce GTX 660/Radeon HD 7870 Storage: 13 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64 bits) Processor: Intel Core i7-3820 (3.6 GHz)/AMD FX-8370 (4.0 GHz) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: 4 GB, GeForce GTX 970/Radeon R9 390 Storage: 13 GB available space Additional Notes: INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED FOR GAME ACTIVATION
